interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Green Leaf Flower Crown for Women Baby Breath Eucalyptus Floral Headband Wreath Headpiece (Yellow Sunflower)
Review Date: 2020/12/15
Store: Bloomlover
Average Rating: 4.6
Product Details: {'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Brand': 'Bloomlover', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '8.66 x 7.28 x 1.77 inches; 3.53 Ounces', 'UPC': '787687864926'}
Review Text: Green Leaf Flower Crown for Women Baby Breath Eucalyptus Floral Headband Wreath Headpiece (Yellow Sunflower) is so delicate and beautiful. The tiny sunflowers are made of fabric and even though the greenery is made of plastic, it is delicate enough to still look lovely. There are two loops on the brown covered wire ends, which tie with a white ribbon. You can shape this wire circle to any shape to custom fit your head and loosen the ribbon on the looped ends to make it larger. You can also use any color or size of ribbon to customize the look you want. A very delicate lovely tiny sunflower head wreath made so you can customize it for your personal needs. 4 ½ STARS.
Review Title: Delicate & Beautiful Tiny Sunflowers Head Wreath Which You Can Customize To Fit Your Personal Needs
Rating: 4.0

reference_summary:
Bloom Krans Vulva Harmony Moisturizer: Organic Vulva Cream for Intimate Feminine Care & Health including Dryness & Itch Relief (Estrogen Free, Dye Free, Fragrance Free, Steroid Free) - 2.25 Oz (Aloe Free - 1 Pack) Bloom Krans {'Brand': 'Bloom Krans', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Unit Count': '2.2 Ounce', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Use for': 'Whole Body'} This Vaginal Moisturizer - Vulva Balm - USDA Organic Aloe Free & Natural Vaginal Cream - Intimate Skin Cream - Reduce Vaginal Dryness, Itching & Burning - Estrogen Free Treatment - V. Harmony (1) will relieve a multitude of irritations caused by many different issues. One of the main irritations are pads or tampons. Every month, especially for a heavy period, menstrual pads can cause painful irritations, dryness, rashes, pain and itching. Then when you are into menopause, the irritations, dryness, rashes, pain and itching are a hundred times worse, due to heavy periods that can last forever.

There are many other issues that can cause constant irritations besides pads and tampons- if you’ve ever had a bad Urinary Tract Infection, where you are urinating frequently in pain, the rashes are unbearable. Having a weak bladder at times where you need a heavier pad or diaper causes more unpleasant rashes. It is so difficult to find a cream that will actually help with severe chafing, dryness, pain, itching and irritations. This V. Harmony Vaginal Moisturizer helps immensely with chafing and dryness. But when it comes to helping with severe rashes, itching and pain- make sure you refrigerate this first before applying, because you will be happy you did. Applying this cold is the best relief ever- the pain goes away immediately. Take the time to refrigerate the jar for maximum, instant relief! 5 STARS. Refrigerate For Maximum, Instant Relief LaClaire Eye Firming Serum with Caffeine, Peptides, Botanicals - Best Treatment for Puffy Eyes, Wrinkles, Fine Lines (5 ml/0.5 oz) LaClaire {'Skin Type': 'Oily, Combination, Dry, Normal', 'Use for': 'Face', 'Scent': 'Aloe', 'Brand': 'LaClaire', 'Item Form': 'Serum', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '5.43 x 5.35 x 5.28 inches; 6.4 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'SG_B07DXG9LDT_US', 'UPC': '891040000569', 'Manufacturer': 'LaClaire'} LaClaire Eye Firming Serum with Caffeine, Peptides, Botanicals - Best Treatment for Puffy Eyes, Wrinkles, Fine Lines (5 ml/0.5 oz) gave me immediate results in reducing puffiness from not sleeping well. I don’t always get a good night’s sleep and in the morning, the puffiness shows and sometimes dark circles accompany the puffiness.

This Eye Firming Serum works unbelievably fast. The puffiness goes away within an hour. As for dark circles, they do fade out with daily use- you will notice a difference within a week. The main thing I noticed is a tighter, firmer feel of my under eye area. This tightening and firming of the delicate eye area actually does make fine lines disappear. Age spots don’t disappear, but your skin will brighten up.

This Eye Firming Serum is so easy to use. You simply apply a drop or two with the dropper and lightly dab into your skin with a finger. If you do this at night, you will wake up to a firmer skin and it looks brighter, but it’s the feeling of firmness and tightness you will love. Applying a good moisturizer after the Eye Serum really makes your under eye skin look fabulous and feeling hydrated. Keeping the dropper clean after use will result in always having the serum perfect and moist with no dried out particles. Any Eye Serum that can immediately get rid of puffiness from a bad night’s sleep and leave your skin around your eyes feeling firmer and tighter gets 5 STARS from me. Instantly Removes Puffiness, But It’s The Firmness & Tightness You Will Love English Laundry Men's 4 Piece Coffret {'Brand': 'English Laundry', 'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Item Volume': '0.67 Fluid Ounces', 'Scent': 'Coriander,Lemon,Sandalwood,Vanilla', 'Special Feature': 'The small sizes make these bottles perfect for traveling.', 'Product Dimensions': '11.2 x 2.3 x 4.5 inches; 0.71 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'CF004', 'UPC': '819029013041', 'Manufacturer': '3B International', 'Country of Origin': 'USA', 'Domestic Shipping': 'Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.', 'International Shipping': 'This item is not eligible for international shipping. Learn More'} English Laundry Men's 4 Piece 20ml Coffret is a truly wonderful men’s cologne set. You are getting four fragrances- rated 4 and 5 STARS all in one box. The fragrances rated by me are based on my years spent working in a cosmetic factory. I will list each fragrance separately.

ARROGANT- With top notes of bergamot and cedar you get a woodsy freshness to the scent. The middle notes of coriander and lavender bring a warm, clean freshness. At the base are sandalwood, amber and musk bringing a warm, sensual, spicy scent. All together, you get a spicy, warm, woodsy scent with a distinctive freshness to it. This light, sensual scent lasts all day and smells wonderful on almost every man, so 5 STARS.

OXFORD BLEU- The top notes of mint and lemon add a citrus freshness. The middle notes of iris and geranium bring a very light floral scent. The base adds sandalwood and vanilla for a woodsy delicious scent. All together, this scent is light, with an undertone bit of floral and clean citrus and a nice light woodsy smell. This light, woodsy fragrance smells fabulous on almost every man and does last long for 5 STARS.

RIVIERA- With top notes of lemon, bergamot, lime and cedar, you get a refreshing citrus/woods scent. In the middle are jasmine, patchouli, vetiver, lavender and mandarin- most of these were used in the 60's sexy, warm, earthy scents. At the base notes are nutmeg and coumarin to add some spice. This is not for every man, but for a man who likes a more vibrant scent. These scents are very noticeable and not light, being a very woodsy, earthy, warm fragrance with a touch of zest. 4 STARS.

NOTTING HILL- The top notes begin with bergamot, lemon and lime for a clean, natural scent. Then the middle notes have bolder peppercorn and jasmine bringing a rose/herbal scent. At the bottom are cedarwood, sandalwood, amber and a powdery musk for a very potent woodsy, animal musky scent. This is definitely not for every man being very heavy scents. There is nothing light about this fragrance. 4 STARS.

With four interesting fragrances, two being light and two being heavy, every man is sure to find one he will like. Lighter scents always smell wonderful on almost every man and the bolder scents smell great on a man depending on how his chemistry goes with the bolder fragrances. 4 ½ STARS. Two 5 STAR and Two 4 STAR Fragrances- some are sure to please every man 10 Pcs Brown and 10 Pcs Black Wig Grip Headband for women Aksice {'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Material': 'Cotton', 'Number of Items': '10', 'Item Weight': '0.04 Pounds', 'Brand': 'Aksice', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '9.29 x 3.5 x 0.39 inches; 0.64 Ounces', 'UPC': '755101763483', 'Manufacturer': 'Sekass'} Sekass Flexible Velvet Headband Non-slip Wig Grip Scarf Beige Adjustable Wig Hair Band for Women is so wonderfully secure all day. If your head circumference is between 20 to 25 inches, you will get a soft and snug fit. This headband is great as it is totally adjustable. The included invisible nylon hair net with elastic keeps every hair in place. The mesh in this cap is woven with nylon/spandex and keeps your head cool as it’s mesh design is wide enough to breathe.

The velvety soft headband is on the thick side, but it holds so well. It has stretchability and velcro to adjust it tightly to your head. Both the net cap and headband are so easy to apply. I love the fact that the net cap holds your hair in place, no matter how thick your hair, it holds it all in nice and flat, while allowing your head to breathe. Then the stretchy headband holds tight to keep your wig from moving or slipping. No more hair pins, tape or glue, just pure comfort with a secure, soft and snug fit. 5 STARS. Pure Comfort & Confidence With A Secure, Soft & Snug Fit N3 No Name Necessary Pore-Minimizing Mattifying Oil and Shine Control Anti-aging Makeup Face Primer Spray (200ml) No Name Necessary {'Brand': 'No Name Necessary', 'Skin Type': 'Combination', 'Package Information': 'Bottle', 'Finish Type': 'Matte', 'Specialty': 'Mattifying', 'Product Dimensions': '1.7 x 1.7 x 7.5 inches; 8.78 Ounces'} N3 No Name Necessary Pore-Minimizing Mattifying Oil and Shine Control Anti-aging Makeup Face Primer Spray (200ml) puts a layer of silky smoothness between your skin and your make-up. I have combination skin- some parts dry, regular and oily. I also have aging skin, so I really didn’t think this primer spray would help me, but it surprisingly did. This comes in a spray bottle and you have to shake the bottle well before spraying, keeping your eyes tightly shut.

It sprays with a fine mist, but has a foaming in it. After spraying, I gently rubbed it more evenly on my face. It dries instantly and wow, my face felt like velvet. If anyone knows about aging skin- your make-up shows the fine lines and wrinkles more exaggerated. This primer spray somehow smooths your skin more, leaving it like a smooth slate for make-up. I am very impressed with this spray, as nothing helps aging skin like this does for make-up, powder, even touch up concealers. A wonderful product. 5 STARS. Puts A Layer Of Silky Smoothness Between You & Your Make-Up Altaba Ombre Brown Short Bob Wig with Bangs Natural Looking Bob Wigs for Women 12" Straight Silky Hair Synthetic Heat Resistant Wigs for Daily Party Cosplay Hair Wig Altaba {'Material': 'Synthetic', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Style': 'Modern', 'Special Feature': 'Heat Resistant', 'Brand': 'Altaba', 'Package Dimensions': '12.09 x 8.07 x 2.28 inches; 5.93 Ounces'} Altaba Brown Short Bob Wig With Bangs Natural Looking Bob Wigs For Women 12" Straight Silky Hair Synthetic Heat Resistant Wigs For Daily Party Cosplay Hair Wig is a cute bob wig. This wig is soft, is a beautiful color and easy to cut or style. It is one of those wigs that doesn’t look fake, if you style it a bit to your face shape, or even trim it a bit. The color is nice, a bit darker than the photos show. The wig is made with good synthetic fibers, which you can easily wash and style with heat tools on a low setting. For fun or play, a cute wig for the price. 4 STARS. For Fun Or Play, A Cute Wig For The Price Green Leaf Flower Crown for Women Baby Breath Eucalyptus Floral Headband Wreath Headpiece (Yellow Sunflower) Bloomlover {'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Brand': 'Bloomlover', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '8.66 x 7.28 x 1.77 inches; 3.53 Ounces', 'UPC': '787687864926'} Green Leaf Flower Crown for Women Baby Breath Eucalyptus Floral Headband Wreath Headpiece (Yellow Sunflower) is so delicate and beautiful. The tiny sunflowers are made of fabric and even though the greenery is made of plastic, it is delicate enough to still look lovely. There are two loops on the brown covered wire ends, which tie with a white ribbon. You can shape this wire circle to any shape to custom fit your head and loosen the ribbon on the looped ends to make it larger. You can also use any color or size of ribbon to customize the look you want. A very delicate lovely tiny sunflower head wreath made so you can customize it for your personal needs. 4 ½ STARS. profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

The user remains dedicated to natural, organic intimate care products while exploring effective skincare, versatile hair accessories, and makeup application. Their recent acquisition of a synthetic wig highlights their interest in diverse hair styling options for fun or special occasions, paired with a preference for practicality and ease of use.

- **Health-Conscious Choices**: Prioritizing products free from harmful ingredients, the user shows sensitivity to formulations suitable for aging skin concerns.

- **Creative Customization**: Their purchase of floral hair accessories indicates an appreciation for personalized and versatile styling options, enhancing their self-expression through grooming.

- **Problem-Solving Approach**: The user actively seeks practical solutions for diverse grooming needs, emphasizing product efficacy and techniques for optimal results.

- **Experience-Based Recommendations**: They value insights from personal experience, focusing on strategies that enhance effectiveness, demonstrating a sophisticated understanding of grooming.

- **High Standards for Performance**: Expecting immediate and significant results from personal care products, their performance-driven mindset aligns with their evolving grooming endeavors.

- **Diverse Interests**: The integration of makeup, new hair styling options, and customized hair accessories with their commitment to gentle yet effective personal grooming showcases a growing passion for self-care.

Overall, the profile illustrates a user dedicated to discovering reliable, effective products across intimate care, skincare, hair accessories, and makeup that promote health, comfort, and results while embracing their diverse interests in personal grooming.
